item.title: LIFES
item.dc:creator: Norbert van Dijk
item.description: The Leiden Institute for FAIR and Equitable Science (LIFES) is a public-private partnership where FAIR data and services are the norm. LIFES will develop and maintain the required expertise and ecosystem for the equitable and privacy preserving reuse of data and services. At this time the webpages of LIFES can be found here on the GO FAIR Foundation website.

item.title: FIP Wizard Important Updates
item.dc:creator: Barbara Magagna
item.description:
We have made a substantial update of the FIP Wizard environment. For all new projects the newest templates are provided automatically. For existing FIPs and FAIR Enabling Resource Projects you need to change to the newest template manually. Click on create migration and switch to these knowledge models:

  • for FAIR Implementation Profile projects to FIP Wizard 4
  • for FAIR Enabling Resource projects switch to FAIR Enabling Resource 2

Thank you for your attention!

item.title: New nanodash platform
item.dc:creator: Barbara Magagna
item.description:
<<<<<<< HEAD

======= There exists now a new nanodash platform: https://nanodash.knowledgepixels.com/. For this platform you also need to make a new introduction nanopub (Go to https://nanodash.knowledgepixels.com/profile and do the Recommended Actions). Please send the nanopub URI to me (@mabablue) in MatterMost so that I can approve it.
>>>>>>> 934babad1d6a8805490320c981c865cf6028d782

There exists now a new nanodash platform: https://nanodash.knowledgepixels.com/. For this platform you also need to make a new introduction nanopub (Go to https://nanodash.knowledgepixels.com/profile and do the Recommended Actions). Please send the nanopub URI to me ((mabablue?)) in MatterMost so that I can approve it.

Disapprovals, retractions and qualifications are linked to the nanopub key that will be put into the list of facilitators in this API. Then everything will work again.
